MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30pm to safely carry out a repair to faulty overhead equipment at Whitless Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:49PM on Friday 16 October 2020.
